resources.string: Tip: only card titles are mandatory

Version 0.11 
 Thanks to "Les joueurs du fort" for testing :-) 

 Do you want do add another language ? 
Contact me (link in play store)
Bonus: +10 for each Land; Clears the word Army from Penalty section of all cards in hand
Bonus: +5 if no Weather in hand
Penalty: -8 unless with at least one Leader
Clears the Penalty sections on all cards in hand
Bonus: +50 if every active card in hand is a different suit
Bonus: you may change the suit of one other card. Its name, bonuses and penalties remain the same.
Bonus: +15 with any one Leader, +40 with both Leader and Sword of Keth
Bonus: +10 for 3-card run, +30 for 4-card run, +60 for 5-card run, +100 for 6-card run, +150 for 7-card run
Bonus: +14 with any Leader or Wizard
Bonus: +30 with Princess, +15 with Empress, Queen, or Elemental Enchantress
Penalty: -40 unless with at least one Wizard
Penalty: Blanks all Armies, Leaders, and other Beasts
Bonus: +100 with Book of Changes, Bell Tower, and any one Wizard
Bonus: +9 for each Weapon and Artifact
Blanks all cards except Flames, Weather, Wizards, Weapons, Artifacts, Great Flood, Island, Mountain, Unicorn, Dragon
Bonus: Add the base strength of any Weapon, Flood, Flame, Land, or Weather in your hand
Clears the Penalty on any one Flood or Flame
Penalty: Blanks all Armies, all Land except Mountain, all Flames except Lightning
Bonus: +25 with Dwarvish Infantry or Dragon; Clears the Penalty on all Weather
Bonus: +12 for each Beast and Elven Archers
Bonus: +50 with both Smoke and Wildfire; Clears the Penalty on all Floods
Bonus: +8 for each Army, Wizard, and other Leader
Bonus: Equal to the base strengths of all Armies in your hand
Bonus: +5 for each Army, +20 for each Army if in the same hand with King
Bonus: +5 for each Army, +20 for each Army if in the same hand with Queen
Bonus: +10 for each Army; Penalty: -5 for each other leader
Bonus: +30 with Elven Archers or Warlord or Beastmaster
Bonus: +10 with any one Leader, +40 with both Leader and Shield of Keth
Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one Flood; Clears the word Army from Penalty section of all Floods
Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one Army, Blanked if hand contains any weather
Bonus: +10 for each Flood; Penalty: Blanks all Flames except Lightning
Bonus: +40 with Rainstorm and either Blizzard or Great Flood
Penalty: This card is blanked unless with at least one Flame
Penalty: Blanks all Floods, -5 for each Army, Leader, Beast, and Flame
May take on the name and suit of any Artifact, Leader, Wizard, Weapon or Beast. Does not take bonus or penalty.
May take on the name and suit of any Army, Land, Weather, Flood or Flame. Does not take bonus or penalty.
May duplicate the name, suit, base strength, and penalty but not bonus of any one other card in your hand
Bonus: At the end of the game, you may take one Army, Leader, Wizard, or Beast from the discard pile and add it to your hand as an eighth card.
Bonus: +5 for each Land, Weather, Flood, and Flame
Bonus: +10 if three different cards in same suit, +40 if four different cards, +100 if five different cards
Bonus: +9 for each Beast; Clears the Penalty on all Beasts
Penalty: -10 for each Leader and other Wizard
BONUS: +10 per other player, At the end of the game, look through the draw deck and put one card in your hand. (Resolves after Leprechaun.)
BONUS: +10 for each card that contains a card with a Penalty not CLEARED.
Prevent one other card from being BLANKED. This card can never be BLANKED.
BONUS: Draw the top card from the deck at the end of the game and add it to your hand. (Resolves before Genie.)
PENALTY: For every non-Outsider card : If that card is the only card you have in that suit, then that card is BLANKED. This takes place before any other BLANKING.
BONUS: +3 for each other card with an odd base strength value OR +50 if entire hand has odd base strength values.
